articles.title: Serum Institute of India fully refunds South Africa for Covid-19 vaccines - Mint
articles.description: Serum Institute of India has fully refunded South Africa for the 500,000 doses of the COVID-19 vaccine
articles.content: The Serum Institute of India has fully refunded South Africa for the 500,000 doses of the COVID-19 vaccine, which were not delivered to the country after it decided not to use the vaccine because it … [+2930 chars]

articles.title: Duterte cuts tariffs on pork imports – The Manila Times - The Manila Times
articles.description: PRESIDENT Rodrigo Duterte has signed an executive order (EO) that temporarily lowered tariffs on imported pork products to address the impact of the African swine fever (ASF) on the hog industry. Duterte stressed the need to take immediate steps to allow the …

articles.title: Covid-19: African Union drops AstraZeneca from its vaccine plan - News24
articles.description:
The African Union's disease control body said on Thursday it has dropped plans to secure
AstraZeneca vaccines for its members.
articles.content:
• The African Union has dropped the AstraZeneca vaccine from its procurement plans.
